mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (spuCode) FROM materialBase where spuCode = #{spuCode}
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM materialBasePropVal WHERE materialBasePropId = #{materialBasePropId} and spuCode = #{spuCode} and materialCode = #{materialCode}
mapper.insert: insert into materialBasePropVal(spuCode, materialCode, materialBasePropId, value) values (#{spuCode}, #{materialCode}, #{materialBasePropId}, #{value})
